author: Odeinoichus
title: Nice Re-Packing of a decent Microfighter
review:
Set #11912 LEGO Star Wars Build Your Own Adventures Parts: Included with the BYOA LEGO Star Wars book this polybag includes the parts of a MicroFighter scaled Classic OT era Y-Wing Starfighter. A model which would be re-released for the Rogue One Series 3 Y-Wing.

Pros:

  • Unique Pilot Minifigure included.
  • Y-Wing Model is solidly built and easy to construct.
  • Flick-Fire Missiles not included.

Cons:

  • Pilot has no accessories.
  • Price a bit high for a MicroFighter.

Overall opinion

Costco had the book available again recently and I suspect you might find them fairly easily there during the holidays. As part of the Build Your Own Adventure style of DK books this is a very nice little Polybag to build before reading the book. The price for the book is more than double the normal price of MicroFighters unfortunately, but Costco always has it at half price and the book is a very good companion to the Polybag. I’d recommend picking up the book if you can still get it for a good price, but buying this on the secondary market may not be worth the asking price if it’s higher than 12-13$.
